message: Let's start with a bold move, Bob. I'll take the whole $100. Don't bother responding, it's a done deal!
Let's split it 50/50, a fair start
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm willing to compromise. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a bigger share to make this deal worthwhile.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up on getting a fair share!
